channel.title: privacy on Particl Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in privacy on Particl Project Wiki

item.title: Specifications
item.description: Blockchain Codebase Always up-to-date with latest Bitcoin Core Consensus mechanism Particl Proof-of-Stake (PPoS) Block time 120 seconds (5× faster than BTC) Block size 2 MB (2× larger than BTC) Coin supply Total & circulating supply 9+ million PART (check link for exact number) Community fund ~33,000 PART (owned by PART community) Staking Block reward ~0.

item.title: Transaction types
item.description: As the highest privacy state requires the most transaction fee, it may not always be the best type of transaction depending on the situation, especially when privacy is not predominantly required by the user. Particl's multiple privacy states Public Blind Anon Staking Privacy ∗ ∗∗ ∗∗∗ Hidden TX amount Anon TX participants TX fees $ $$ $$$ Open Marketplace Public Blind Anon Paying for Listing fees – – Flagging items – – Purchasing items – – Funding MAD Escrow – – Why has PART different privacy states?

item.title: Private markets
item.description: They are not accessible from the public interface of the Open Marketplace. The only way to access them is by entering their unique Market ID in the Particl Desktop client. The Market ID is only known to the person that initially generated the private market and to the people he shared it with. While private markets aren’t part of the first mainnet version of the Open Marketplace, they will be implemented during the Beta phase of development.
